md:
giải nghĩa từ "spend" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.
1. Spend (verb) - Chi tiêu, tiêu xài
	* Meaning: to pay out money in order to buy or do something
	* Example: I spent all my money on a new phone.
	* Related words: expense, cost, pay, invest
2. Spend (verb) - Đánh mất, lãng phí
	* Meaning: to waste or use up something, especially time or energy
	* Example: I spent the whole day watching TV and didn't get anything done.
	* Related words: waste, squander, idle, lazy
3. Spend (verb) - Đi qua, trải qua
	* Meaning: to pass or go through a period of time
	* Example: I spent the summer traveling around Europe.
	* Related words: pass, go, live, experience

Note: The verb "spend" can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used.
